amendment.description: To reaffirm the inalienable rights of every American citizen guaranteed by the Constitution of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 13 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 59. Record Vote Number: 14.

action.text: Amendment SA 13 proposed by Senator Coburn.
